 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָכַל‎</span>] **verb** ==be foolish, or a fool==, usually in moral or spititual sense (Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Aph\`el ***act foolishly***; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***foolish***, etc., [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְכַל‎</span> derived species, ***act foolishly***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַכְלָא‎</span> ***fool***; Christian-Palestinian Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Aph\`el = <span class="bdbLangGreek">ἁμαρτάνω</span>, also derivatives [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>Idioticon 62</sup>; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***saklu***</u></abbr>, perhaps ***foolish***, [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 498</sup>; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְכַל‎</span> ***know, be intelligent, cause to understand***, etc. (derived species), compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂכל‎</span>; [[BDB#Me|Mei]]<sup>Chrest. Targ.</sup> derives both these opposite meanings from Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***form, likeness***. [[BDB#Gerber|Gerber]]<sup>178</sup> thinks Hebrew verb denominative); — 

**Piel** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְסַכֵּל‎</span> [[Isa.44.25|Isa 44:25]], ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַכֶּלנָֿא‎</span> [[2Sam.15.31|2Sam 15:31]], ***make foolish, turn into foolishness***. **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִסְכַּלְתָּ‎</span> [[2Chr.16.9|2Chr 16:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִסְכָּ֑לְתָּ‎</span> [[1Sam.13.13|1Sam 13:13]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִסְכַּלְתִּי‎</span> [[2Sam.24.10|2Sam 24:10]] = [[1Chr.21.8|1Chr 21:8]], ***act or do foolishly***. **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִסְכַּלְתָּ‎</span> [[Gen.31.28|Gen 31:28]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִסְכַּלְתִּי‎</span> [[1Sam.26.21|1Sam 26:21]], ***do foolishly, play the fool***.
